title: Italianissimo 1: beginners. Eps 6-10
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Italy - Social life and customs
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Languages, Modern - Study and teaching
description: A multimedia language course which intorduces students to the idioms, grammar customs and scenery of Italy. The five episodes on this tape are entitled: "Il mondo della musica" which looks at using the telephone; "A casa nostra" looks at inside the home, making dates and talking about places; "Che giornata" looks at polite requests, apologising, commiserating, asking and giving directions"; "A caccia di funghi" looks at quantity, expressions of love, fear and hate; and "La Moda" which looks at buying clothes and price. Featured in these episodes are Italian fashion, regional food and the regions of Emilia and Romagna. Four audio-cassettes, and teacher and student textbooks are avilable and can be booked as separate items.
